players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the mafioso.
Night 1 begins.
You killed Diana.
Diana was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
You: "Shocked that Diana is gone. We need to be careful and share any info we have. Bob, Charlie, did you notice anything suspicious?"
Bob: "I didn't notice anything suspicious last night. Alice, did you have any special information to share?"
Charlie: "Since Diana is dead, I think we should be cautious and discuss what happened last night. We need to figure out who might have done this before making any accusations."
You: "I agree we need to be cautious. Since Diana was killed, the mafia is clearly active. We should look at voting patterns and who might benefit from her death."
Charlie: "Since we've established that the mafia is active and Diana was killed, I think it would be a good idea to focus on Bob's actions last night. Did he notice anything suspicious?"
Bob: "I didn't notice anything suspicious last night. Charlie, why are you suddenly focusing on me instead of sharing your own observations?"
Votes: Alice voted for Charlie, Bob voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Alice
Charlie was arrested
